reqs: This course is titled "Gender and Security". Limited seating may be available to non-MPPGA students. Please contact the program (mppga.program@ubc.ca).
courseName: Special Topics in Public Policy - TOPS PUBLIC PLCY
description: Offerings respond to current policy debates, topics of emerging interest, availability of visiting scholars, and interest in non-traditional courses incorporating practitioner expertise, interest in particular disciplinary perspectives missing from core courses and electives, and interest in specific regions or countries.
